birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国浙江省杭州市

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、外交官。曾任中华民国外交部部长、监察院院长等职务。其父为钱思亮，兄长为钱纯、钱煦。与陈履安、连战、沈君山并称为政坛“四公子”。
description.en: A politician and diplomat of the Republic of China. He has served as Minister of Foreign Affairs, President of the Control Yuan, and other positions. His father is Chien Shih-Liang, and his brothers are Chien Chun and Shu Chien. He is known as one of the 'Four Princes' of the political scene, along with Chen Li-an, Lien Chan, and Shen Chun-shan.

nodes.id: 台北市立建国高级中学

zh-cn: 台北市立建国高级中学

description.zh-cn: 钱复之父，曾任国立台湾大学校长、中央研究院院长及行政院原子能委员会主任委员。
description.en: Father of Fredrick Chien, he served as President of National Taiwan University, President of Academia Sinica, and Chairman of the Atomic Energy Council of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 钱复之兄，曾任中华民国中央银行副总裁、财政部部长等职。
description.en: Brother of Fredrick Chien, served as Deputy Governor of the Central Bank of the Republic of China, Minister of Finance, and other positions.

description.zh-cn: 钱复之兄，中央研究院院士，美国国家科学院、工程院、医学院三院院士。
description.en: Brother of Fredrick Chien, an academician of Academia Sinica and a member of the National Academy of Sciences, National Academy of Engineering, and National Academy of Medicine in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 钱复的祖父，曾为中华民国法官、上海地区检察官，因不屈于汪精卫政府而被日本特务暗杀。
description.en: Grandfather of Fredrick Chien, he was a judge and prosecutor in Shanghai for the Republic of China. He was assassinated by Japanese secret agents for his refusal to submit to the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 钱复的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Fredrick Chien.

description.zh-cn: 钱复的儿子。
description.en: Son of Fredrick Chien.

description.zh-cn: 钱复的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Fredrick Chien.

description.zh-cn: 钱复的长孙，美国演员。
description.en: Eldest grandson of Fredrick Chien, an American actor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who was the President of the Republic of China.

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，连震东之子，曾任行政院院长、副总统，与钱复等人并称“四公子”。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Lien Chen-tung. He served as Premier of the Executive Yuan and Vice President, and is known as one of the 'Four Princes' along with Fredrick Chien and others.

nodes.id: 行政院经济建设委员会

zh-cn: 行政院经济建设委员会
en: Council for Economic Planning and Development

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

en: Coordination Council for North American Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在美国的代表机构，后更名为驻美国台北经济文化代表处。
description.en: The representative office of the Republic of China in the United States, later renamed the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长、中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier of the Executive Yuan and President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 第二次中日战争期间由汪精卫等人于南京成立的政权，被普遍认为是日本的傀儡政权。
description.en: A regime established in Nanjing by Wang Jingwei and others during the Second Sino-Japanese War, widely regarded as a Japanese puppet state.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事人物，曾任中华民国副总统。
description.en: A political and military figure in the Republic of China who served as Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，陈诚之子，曾任国防部部长、监察院院长，与钱复等人并称“四公子”。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Chen Cheng. He served as Minister of National Defense and President of the Control Yuan, and is known as one of the 'Four Princes' along with Fredrick Chien and others.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任内政部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Minister of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国农业经济学家，曾任农村复兴联合委员会主委。
description.en: An agricultural economist of the Republic of China who served as Chairman of the Joint Commission on Rural Reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国学者、教育家，沈宗瀚之子，曾任清华大学校长，与钱复等人并称“四公子”。
description.en: A scholar and educator of the Republic of China, son of Shen Tsung-han. He served as President of National Tsing Hua University and is known as one of the 'Four Princes' along with Fredrick Chien and others.

description.zh-cn: 对20世纪80年代台湾政坛四位中国国民党籍第二代政治人物的并称，指钱复、陈履安、连战、沈君山。
description.en: A collective term for four second-generation Kuomintang politicians in Taiwan's political scene in the 1980s: Fredrick Chien, Chen Li-an, Lien Chan, and Shen Chun-shan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。曾希望钱复续任监察院院长但被婉拒。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. He had hoped for Fredrick Chien to continue serving as President of the Control Yuan, but was declined.

description.zh-cn: 一个总部设在中国的非政府、非营利性国际组织。
description.en: A non-governmental, non-profit international organization headquartered in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，蒋中正的妻子。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China, wife of Chiang Kai-shek.

nodes.id: 美军在台犯罪人员交由美军处理原则

zh-cn: 美军在台犯罪人员交由美军处理原则

description.zh-cn: 一项由钱复在1969年主张的针对驻台美军犯罪案件的处理原则，即中华民国政府舍弃司法管辖权，将涉案美军交由美军当局自行处理。
description.en: A policy advocated by Fredrick Chien in 1969 regarding criminal cases involving US military personnel stationed in Taiwan, whereby the government of the Republic of China would waive its jurisdiction and hand over the accused to the US military authorities for handling.

relationships.target: 台北市立建国高级中学

degree.en: Bachelor of Arts in Political Science

degree.zh-cn: 国际关系哲学硕士, 国际关系哲学博士
degree.en: Master of Philosophy in International Relations, Doctor of Philosophy in International Relations

description.zh-cn: 钱裕扬是钱复的长孙。
description.en: Justin Chien is the eldest grandson of Fredrick Chien.

description.zh-cn: 提名为钱复为监察院院长。
description.en: Nominated Fredrick Chien as President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 在郝柏村担任行政院院长期间，钱复任其内阁的外交部部长。
description.en: During Hau Pei-tsun's tenure as Premier of the Executive Yuan, Fredrick Chien served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in his cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在连战担任行政院院长期间，钱复任其内阁的外交部部长。
description.en: During Lien Chan's tenure as Premier of the Executive Yuan, Fredrick Chien served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in his cabinet.

relationships.target: 行政院经济建设委员会

position.zh-cn: 驻美代表, 行政院经济建设委员会主任委员
position.en: Representative to the US, Chairman of the Council for Economic Planning and Development

description.zh-cn: 在俞国华担任行政院院长期间，钱复先后担任驻美代表及经建会主委。
description.en: During Yu Kuo-hwa's tenure as Premier of the Executive Yuan, Fredrick Chien served successively as Representative to the US and Chairman of the CEPD.

position.zh-cn: 行政院经济建设委员会主任委员
position.en: Chairman of the Council for Economic Planning and Development

position.zh-cn: 行政院新闻局局长, 驻美代表
position.en: Director-General of the Government Information Office, Representative to the US

description.zh-cn: 钱复在蒋经国分别担任行政院院长和总统期间，先后出任新闻局局长和驻美代表。
description.en: Fredrick Chien served as Director-General of the GIO and Representative to the US during Chiang Ching-kuo's tenures as Premier and President, respectively.

description.zh-cn: 钱鸿业因不屈从汪精卫政权，被日本特务暗杀。
description.en: Qian Hongye was assassinated by Japanese secret agents for his refusal to submit to the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 钱鸿业因不屈从汪精卫政权，被其治下的日本特务暗杀。
description.en: Qian Hongye was assassinated by Japanese secret agents operating under the Wang Jingwei regime for his refusal to submit.

description.zh-cn: 在一个国民党专案小组会议上提出“大陆政策的位阶要高于外交政策”的核心观点，认为国家统一纲领的基石能带来安全保证。
description.en: At a KMT task force meeting, he proposed the core view that 'mainland policy should take precedence over foreign policy,' believing that the cornerstone of the Guidelines for National Unification could provide security guarantees.

description.zh-cn: 在钱复卸任后，陈水扁提名的监察院院长人选未获得由国民党控制的立法院同意，导致监察院空转。
description.en: After Fredrick Chien's term ended, Chen Shui-bian's nominee for the President of the Control Yuan was not approved by the KMT-controlled Legislative Yuan, causing the Control Yuan to become idle.

description.zh-cn: 在2009年至2011年期间，钱复三次参与博鳌论坛并与时任中国国务院总理温家宝会面。
description.en: From 2009 to 2011, Fredrick Chien participated in the Boao Forum three times and met with then-Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国在给宋美龄的函电中表示，会将她关于对美关系的指示转告钱复切实办理。
description.en: In a cable to Soong Mei-ling, Chiang Ching-kuo stated that he would convey her instructions regarding US relations to Fredrick Chien for implementation.

relationships.target: 美军在台犯罪人员交由美军处理原则

description.zh-cn: 钱复在一份给外交部的签呈中主张，涉及美军的案件应舍弃管辖权，交由美军当局自行处理，以避免政治后果和离间中美关系。
description.en: In a submission to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Fredrick Chien advocated that jurisdiction in cases involving US military personnel should be waived and handed over to US military authorities to avoid political consequences and alienating Sino-US relations.
